nodes.name: computeRealCap
enableRealCap
computeReturn
contributeETH
contributeBTCs
processContribution
computeRealCap
enableRealCap
computeReturn
contributeETH
contributeBTCs
processContribution

acceptOwnership().details: used by a new owner to accept an ownership transfer

acceptTokenOwnership().details: used by a new owner to accept a token ownership transfer can only be called by the contract owner

computeRealCap(uint256,uint256).details: computes the real cap based on the given cap & key

params._key: key used to compute the cap hash

computeReturn(uint256).details: computes the number of tokens that should be issued for a given contribution

contributeBTCs().details: Contribution through BTCs (Bitcoin Suisse only) can only be called before the crowdsale started

contributeETH().details: ETH contribution can only be called during the crowdsale

disableTokenTransfers(bool).details: disables/enables token transfers can only be called by the contract owner

params._disable: true to disable transfers, false to enable them

enableRealCap(uint256,uint256).details: enables the real cap defined on deployment

params._key: key used to compute the cap hash

transferOwnership(address).details: allows transferring the contract ownership the new owner still needs to accept the transfer can only be called by the contract owner

transferTokenOwnership(address).details: allows transferring the token ownership the new owner needs to accept the transfer can only be called by the contract owner

withdrawFromToken(address,address,uint25.details: withdraws tokens held by the controller and sends them to an account can only be called by the owner

params._to: account to receive the new amount

withdrawTokens(address,address,uint256).details: withdraws tokens held by the contract and sends them to an account can only be called by the owner

params._to: account to receive the new amount
